Posts.Content: age 70. probably 80 percent continet. no erectile function yet. 1/2 ciallis per day. treadmill 20 minutes per day, speed 3 flat. 3 sets of kegal per day [20 per set]. have developed very sore mucles in abdomen. my wife thinks I have been doing kegals incorrectly. she could be right. anybody out there having this problem? I am extremely fit for my age.
Posts.Title: 6 weeks post ralp
